channel.title: rant on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in rant on Barefoot Rob

item.title: I can choose to do anything (and no one really cares)
item.description: So long as I do stuff within a normalized range, no one really cares what I do. I can spend all day trying to figure out one bug, or ignore it. No one will know the difference. I could even quit my job, and just a few people will notice. (some people very much so, but 99+% will not) Re-reading the above sounds like I am suicidal, but I am not.
